trends: There have been 14 other sightings in Manchester
There were no other sightings in Manchester on or around August 29th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting on my deck in manchester,ct around 11:30 pm when noticed a pulsating blue orb crossing the sky from west to east.It wasn't a plane or chopper because it was silent and there where no blinkung lights.I ran to see if i could record it with my camera but it was not possible.For me that was a UFO!! Thanks!!
